title: Project-Based Learning (PBL) Improvement Program for Enhancing Scientific Problem-Solving Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Asynchronous Mobile Learning Environment Emphasizing Collaborative Problem-Solving and Real-World Applications

learning_goals: Learners can select project topics defining local community science problems with over 80% participation.
Learners can revise and improve project plans at least three times by incorporating peer evaluations and expert feedback.
Learners can upload the final product to a mobile platform and explain it through a 5-minute video presentation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
